title: Flash Gordon
writer: Lorenzo Semple Jr., Michael Allin, Alex Raymond
actors: Sam J. Jones, Melody Anderson, Max von Sydow
plot: Football player Flash Gordon and his comrades travel to the planet Mongo and find themselves fighting the tyranny of Ming the Merciless to save Earth from its eventual destruction.
country: United Kingdom, United States, Netherlands, Italy
awards: Nominated for 3 BAFTA 2 wins & 14 nominations total
